name: Save the office- TEAM 5
description:
Save the office (Looking for someone to save the office) was made during the Godmother/Godfather game jam, on the theme "Super-hero of a new kind".
This jam was created by and for the university "Institute of Internet and Multimedia", to start the school year with all the students from the Video Game section, from bachelor 2 to Master 2! 

 Become the hero of the open-space!

In Save the office (also called Looking for someone to save the office), you are a super hero of the shadows. The kind of hero that no one thought they would need, but without you, the company would drown... 

Help your co-workers and your Boss by bringing them coffee, printing files for important presentations or by looking for old obscure documents in the archives room. But be careful, if you have too many tasks at the same time, you might burnout!

 With great power comes great responsibility...

At the top of your screen, you will receive tasks represented by colored post-its. Your mission is to complete all the tasks, so that the office stills run!

  • Complete the tasks for your co-workers, and carry up to 2, to be more efficient!
    • Bring them coffee
    • Print important papers 
    • Bring them documents from the archives room
  • Bring the objects to the right co-worker by checking the colors of the post-its and matching it with the colors of the characters
  • Watch out for the golden tasks! They come from your impatient boss and might save you if you have too many tasks at the same time...
 How to play?

You can play the game by downloading it at the bottom of this page. Note that you can use both a keyboard and a controller, according to your preference!

  • If you play with a controller
    • Left stick to move
    • A to interact with an object (select or grab)
  • If you play with a keyboard
    • ZQSD to move
    • Space bar to interact with an object (select or grab)
 Soundtrack

If you always dreamed to listen to elevator music style, also called muzak, all-day long, here is a link to the soundtrack of Save the office! Listen to it while working, and you might become your office's hero in real life (but we hope that you won't have to bring coffee to everyone).
